context.p: Person who create the documents for assisting the component(s).

p.b: How to add content to Component Documents?

context.p: Component Document contributor can create/amend the overview about the component(s), create word documents which containing complete documentation about the component(s) and would be able to check-in their changes in T24 Common Stream of RTC Server.

The T24 Component overview is created manually by the respective teams. When a user wants to add or modify the overview of a component, the 'Create Document' action on the Component Landscape view can be used.

step.cmd: Upon right-click of an item in Component Landscape view, a pop up will be displayed with the option "Create document".
On selecting the respective Product --> Component,it throws another dialog to capture the documents from the users.
Upon hitting "Save" in the dialog, the contents will be saved locally. On delivering to the stream, the other users can view the documents added.

p.u: How the Tables and Batches are created?

postreq.p: The documents about Tables and Batches for each component created through a utility which will be run on during T24 project build preparations. The document contents are stored as xml files in an RTC Stream.

Contributors can create a new word documents and save it as single web page(.mht) format and then put it into the respective component folder under T24CompDoc location. For example if a contributor creates a document for AA_FRAMEWORK he/she has to put that document within AA_Framework folder belongs to product AA which is under the T24CompDoc root folder.

ul.li: Charts/Diagrams using within a document should be an image.
File name should be as similar as component name(Document for AA_FRAMEWORK must have the name AA_FRAMEWORK.mht)
